result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin J Mullis

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Justin J Mullis in court with attorney Joe Edward Kremkoski.  Defendant Justin J Mullis in custody.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
Plea:
15CF1135:  Ct. 1 - NC.

BTC:
15CF1135:  Ct. 1 - GUILTY.  Ct. 2 - DRI.
15CF1309:  DRI.
PSI ordered.
Status conference scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  No contact with the victim, HMS (person, property, residence or family).   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

**AMENDED 10-12-2015:  Defendant is allowed contact with victim while in Racine County Jail.  May not discuss case.  If defendant is released, no contact order still applies.**

Defendant Justin J Mullis in court with attorney Joe Edward Kremkoski.  Defendant Justin J Mullis in custody.  Rebecca L. Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Katie Giebel.
Parties had submitted a stip and order for bond mod.  Court did not sign and requested that hearing be set for further information.
State stands silent with regard to victim speaking.
BTC:  Defendant is allowed contact with victim while in RCJ.  May not discuss case.  If released, no contact order still applies.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Proposed stip and order to modify bond to no violent contact forwarded to Judge Piontek with file.
BTC:  Court will not sign because the defendant was out on bail on two cases, according to complaint, and ordered not to comsume alcohol.  Clerk to contact parties. 9-23-15/lkh.

Defendant Justin J Mullis in court with attorney Joe Edward Kremkoski.  Defendant Justin J Mullis in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 9, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  No contact with the victim, HMS (person, property, residence or family).   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Justin J Mullis in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Defendant Justin J Mullis in custody.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
